books.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Titan's Curse
books.subtitle: Written by Rick Riordan, this Fantasy novel is the third book of a series that amazed me.

books.title: The Pressure's Off: There is a Better Way to Live
books.subtitle: By Larry Crabb, this book teaches you a lot about leaving your past actions and mistakes to God. p.s. I read the Portuguese version 'Chega de Regras'..
